title: Digital- GEN AI- Senior
description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.
   

  

**EY\- Assurance – Senior \- Digital
   

  

 Position Details**
 As part of EY GDS Assurance Digital, you will be responsible for implementing innovative ideas through AI research to develop high growth \& impactful products.
   

  

 You will be helping EY’s sector and service line professionals by developing analytics enabled solutions, integrating data science activities with business relevant aspects to gain insight from data. You will work with multi\-disciplinary teams across the entire region to support global clients.
   

  

 This is a core full\-time AI developer role, responsible for creating innovative solutions by applying AI based techniques for business problems. As our in\-house senior AI engineer, your expertise and skills will be vital in our ability to steer one of our Innovation agenda.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Convert business problem into analytical problem and devise a solution approach.
* Clean, aggregate, analyze and interpret the data to derive business insights from it.
* Own the AI/ML implementation process: Model Design, Feature Planning, Testing, Production Setup, Monitoring, and release management.
* Work closely with the Solution Architects in deployment of the AI POC’s and scaling up to production level applications.
* Should have solid background in Python and has deployed on open\-source models\-
* Work on data extraction techniques from complex PDF/Word Doc/Forms\- entities extraction, table extraction, information comparison.


**Key Requirements/Skills \& Qualification:**
* Excellent academic background, including at a minimum a bachelor or a master’s degree in data science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Engineering, Operational Research, or other related field with strong focus on modern data architectures, processes, and environments.
* Solid background in Python with excellent coding skills.
* 4\+ years of core data science experience in one or more below areas:
+ Machine Learning (Regression, Classification, Decision Trees, Random Forests, Timeseries Forecasting and Clustering)
+ Understanding and usage of Large Language Models like Open AI models like ChatGPT, GPT4, frameworks like LangChain and Llama Index.
+ Good understanding of open source LLM framework like Mistral, Llama, etc. and fine tuning on custom datasets.
+ Deep Learning (DNN, RNN, LSTM, Encoder\-Decoder Models)
+ Natural Language Processing\- Text Summarization, Aspect Mining, Question Answering, Text Classification, NER, Language Translation, NLG, Sentiment Analysis, Sentence
+ Computer Vision\- Image Classification, Object Detection, Tracking etc.
+ SQL/NoSQL Databases and its manipulation components
+ Working knowledge of API Deployment (Flask/FastAPI/Azure Function Apps) and webapps creation, Docker, Kubernetes.


**Additional skills requirements:**
* Excellent written, oral, presentation and facilitation skills
* Ability to coordinate multiple projects and initiatives simultaneously through effective prioritization,
* organization, flexibility, and self\-discipline.
* Must have demonstrated project management experience.
* Knowledge of firm’s reporting tools and processes.
* Proactive, organized, and self\-sufficient with ability to priorities and multitask.
* Analyses complex or unusual problems and can deliver insightful and pragmatic solutions.
* Ability to quickly and easily create/ gather/ analyze data from a variety of sources.
* A robust and resilient disposition able to encourage discipline in team behaviors


**What We Look For**
* A Team of people with commercial acumen, technical experience, and enthusiasm to learn new things in this fast\-moving environment
* An opportunity to be a part of market\-leading, multi\-disciplinary team of 7200 \+ professionals, in the only integrated global assurance business worldwide.
* Opportunities to work with EY GDS Assurance practices globally with leading businesses across a range of industries


**What Working At EY Offers**
 At EY, we’re dedicated to helping our clients, from startups to Fortune 500 companies — and the work we do with them is as varied as they are.
   

  

 You get to work with inspiring and meaningful projects. Our focus is education and coaching alongside practical experience to ensure your personal development. We value our employees, and you will be able to control your own development with an individual progression plan. You will quickly grow into a responsible role with challenging and stimulating assignments. Moreover, you will be part of an interdisciplinary environment that emphasizes high quality and knowledge exchange. Plus, we offer:
   

  

* Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around
* Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career
* The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you


**EY \| Building a better working world**
 EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long\-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.
   

  

 Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.
   

  

 Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

title: AI Fullstack Engineer
description:
**Experience** 
 : 4\.00 \+ years
   

  

**Salary** 
 : Confidential (based on experience)
   

  

**Shift** 
 : (GMT\+05:30\) Asia/Kolkata (IST)
   

  

**Opportunity Type** 
 : Remote
   

  

**Placement Type** 
 : Full time Permanent Position
   

  

**(\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \- HurixDigital)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 Python, LLM, Rag (retrieval\-augmented generation), AWS
   

  

**HurixDigital is Looking for:******
**Job Summary**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative AI Engineer with Full Stack capabilities to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will bring a strong blend of expertise in artificial intelligence, modern software engineering practices, and cloud infrastructure. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying intelligent applications that are scalable, resilient, and deliver real business value.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Develop and deploy end\-to\-end AI\-powered applications leveraging full\-stack development best practices.
* Architect and integrate AI/ML models and pipelines using tools like LangChain, Hugging Face, OpenAI, and Anthropic Claude APIs.
* Design and implement microservices, RESTful APIs, and backend systems with scalability and maintainability in mind.
* Leverage cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) for hosting, automation, and scaling services.
* Integrate CI/CD pipelines to ensure smooth and frequent deployment cycles.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
* Apply techniques such as content chunking, vector search, embedding models, and retrievers to build advanced AI retrieval systems.
* Ensure robust architecture that can withstand variable load conditions, focusing on fault tolerance and high availability.
* Maintain documentation and adhere to best practices in software development and AI model integration.


**Required Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* 5\+ years of hands\-on experience in AI engineering and full\-stack development.
* Strong proficiency with AI/ML tools including LangChain, Hugging Face, OpenAI, and Claude APIs.
* Deep understanding of vector databases, retrievers, and modern NLP workflows.
* Proficient in one or more full\-stack frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Django, React, Angular).
* Experience with Python
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and infrastructure automation tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
* Solid experience with CI/CD pipelines, GitOps, and container orchestration (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* Proven ability to architect resilient systems and optimize performance under fluctuating workloads.


**Preferred Skills**
* Knowledge of prompt engineering and LLM fine\-tuning techniques.
* Familiarity with DevSecOps practices and AI compliance requirements.
* Exposure to multimodal models and real\-time inference systems.


 What We Offer
   

  

* Opportunity to work on cutting\-edge AI products and tools.
* Collaborative and inclusive team environment.
* Flexible work schedule and remote work options.
* Competitive salary and performance bonuses.


**How to apply for this opportunity?**
* Step 1: Click On Apply! And Register or Login on our portal.
* Step 2: Complete the Screening Form \& Upload updated Resume
* Step 3: Increase your chances to get shortlisted \& meet the client for the Interview!


**About Uplers:**
 Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant contractual onsite opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement.
   

  

 (Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).
   

  

 So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer - Generative AI
company: Flipped.ai - Transforming Talent Acquisition with AI
description:
**About You**
 You're a highly motivated, hands\-on engineer with a deep conviction in AI's potential to transform industries. Your enthusiasm for technology is matched by your energy and curiosity. Thriving in unstructured startup environments, you possess a strong work ethic and a high degree of autonomy. Your approach is both creative and strategic, eagerly tackling challenges and leveraging AI to drive industry advancements.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We seek an exceptional AI engineer with a robust background in emerging technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT, LLAMA, BERT, and transformer\-based architectures. Your role will involve fine\-tuning and optimizing these models for our AI wealth technology platform, ensuring they seamlessly integrate with our systems to enhance the user experience. This position demands a blend of technical prowess, innovative thinking, and leadership, ideal for someone passionate about applying AI within consumer fintech.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and execute a comprehensive AI roadmap that aligns with our strategic business goals.
* Lead the technical design, development, testing, deployment, documentation, and maintenance of end\-to\-end AI features.
* Innovate in data management, strategically using embeddings to improve the relevancy of vector search.
* Collaborate with marketing, product, and business teams to integrate AI technologies across applications.
* Stay abreast of the latest AI trends, including advanced prompting techniques, AI agent construction, and in\-context learning workflows.
* Contribute groundbreaking ideas for future AI initiatives and technology integration.
* Foster a culture of technical excellence, agility, and innovation within the team, contributing to strategic planning and the overall technological direction of the company.


**Qualifications**
* Ph.D. in computer science, AI/ML, or related fields, with a focus on deep learning, neural networks, and generative AI.
* At least 2\-7 years of experience in AI/ML, with expertise in developing, fine\-tuning, and optimizing large language models and transformer\-based architectures.
* Profound knowledge of deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and in\-context learning workflows, including data preprocessing, embedding, prompt construction, and execution.
* Demonstrated experience with API integration and the development of AI agents, showcasing the ability to test and design AI performance and reliability measures.
* Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, or similar languages, with a thorough understanding of software engineering best practices.
* Exceptional communication skills, capable of conveying complex AI concepts to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders.

title: Artificial Intelligence Specialist
description:
Job Summary
 



  





 The selected extern will work closely with and directly support the AI Engineer. They will be involved in both planning and execution of projects, participating in end\-to\-end solution development, from initial discussions to implementation. This is a hands\-on, learning\-focused externship designed for students interested in automation, AI tools, and enterprise process optimization. Externs will gain practical experience in developing RAGs for enterprise use, generating Power Automate flows to improve processes across departments, and assisting in basic IT support tasks. Additionally, externs will gain significant experience with AI tools such as ChatGPT, Copilot, Cursor AI, Gemini (VEO3\), and more.
 



  





 Essential Functions
 



  




* **AI Chatbot Development:**
* Assist in the design, development, and testing of Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbots for enterprise applications.
* Contribute to data preparation and knowledge base curation for chatbots.



  




* **Power Automate Flow Development:**
* Build Power Automate workflows based on outlined requirements and use cases.
* Participate in review sessions and test the functionality of developed flows.
* Document usage instructions and flow logic.



  




* **Basic IT Support:**
* Assist in basic IT support tasks.



  





 Required Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities
 



  




* Basic understanding of Microsoft Power Automate
* Familiarity with Microsoft Tools (Outlook, Teams, SharePoint, Excel)
* Exposure to AI tools like ChatGPT, Copilot, etc.
* Ability to read, comprehend, and summarize long documents.
* Good written communication skills to document workflows, feedback, and summaries.



  





 Education and Experience
 



  




* Currently pursuing a bachelor’s or master’s degree. STEM majors are preferred, but any student who can demonstrate relevant coursework or project experience with automation, AI, or Microsoft tools will be considered.
* No experience required, but the candidate should be able to discuss academic or personal projects that show familiarity with relevant technologies.

title: Senior ML/AI Engineer
description:
**About the Company** 

 We’re hiring for a small, fast\-growing deep\-tech startup building a first\-of\-its\-kind, zero\-touch wireless network design platform using AI and 3D digital twins. Our product automates network planning for complex environments—dramatically reducing what typically takes months to mere minutes.
 



 We’re looking for an experienced ML/AI engineer who’s excited to own production AI pipelines end\-to\-end and help shape the company’s technical direction.
 



  





**Position Overview** 




**Role** 

 : Senior ML/AI Engineer
 




**Location** 

 : Brooklyn, NY
 




**Work Policy** 

 : Hybrid – 4 days/week onsite (potential future relocation to Manhattan)
 




**Employment Type** 

 : Full\-time
 




**Equity** 

 : Competitive, meaningful equity package
 




**Hiring Urgency** 

 : ASAP
 




  





**Role Scope** 




 As the
 **Senior ML/AI Engineer** 
 , you will:
 


* Build and optimize AI pipelines in production
* Lead design, training, fine\-tuning, and deployment of LLM models
* Work with AWS Bedrock and Langchain to integrate AI into enterprise\-grade SaaS products
* Drive prompt engineering strategies that enhance performance and usability
* Collaborate with backend and frontend engineers to embed ML features in production systems
* Own and scale ML/LLM infrastructure while maintaining reliability and performance
* Take ownership from early\-stage R\&D to stable deployment
* Work directly with founders and influence company direction



  





**Ideal Candidate Profile** 




**Technical Background:** 



* 8\+ years of software engineering experience (Python required)
* 5\+ years of experience in classical machine learning, with transition into LLM work in the past 2–3 years
* Hands\-on experience with AWS Bedrock, Langchain, vector databases, and LLM frameworks
* Experience deploying scalable ML/AI products in production (SaaS or platform\-based preferred)
* Strong understanding of MLOps, data pipelines, and GPU\-based acceleration (PyTorch, TensorFlow, CUDA is a bonus)



**Educational Background:** 



* Advanced degree (M.S./Ph.D. preferred) in Computer Science, AI, ML, Physics, or related fields
* Strong academic and research foundation, or equivalent industry experience



**Bonus Skills:** 



* Familiarity with 3D simulations, geometry, GPU coding, or scientific computing
* Background in telecommunications or edge computing a plus
* Experience working with minimal oversight in startup or research settings



**Soft Skills:** 



* Strong communication; can collaborate cross\-functionally
* Problem\-solving mindset; zero ego and proactive ownership
* Comfortable in fast\-moving, ambiguous environments
* Motivated by solving impactful technical problems over chasing salary alone

title: Founding Gen AI Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 Foothill Ventures is a technology\-focused venture fund based in Los Altos, California. We make pre\-seed, seed (preferred), and A\-round investments in startups across software, life science, and deep tech. We grew out of the TEEC Angel Fund, which made seed\-stage, highly successful bets on companies like Zoom Communications, Carta, Plus.ai, WeRide.ai and Ginkgo Bioworks, all subsequent Unicorns.
   

  

*We provide support to our portfolio companies in various areas, including* 
*recruiting and talent acquisition* 
**.** 
***This role is posted on our website for our portfolio companies.***
**Job Description**
**About our portfolio company ResiQuant:**
 At ResiQuant, we're tackling one of the biggest challenges in disaster resilience: the lack of accurate, standardized, and dynamic property data. In a world increasingly impacted by climate change and natural disasters like earthquakes, hurricanes, and wildfires, decisions about risk are often made with incomplete or incorrect information.
   

  

 Our mission is to empower insurers, financial institutions, and asset managers with AI systems fused with structural engineering expertise. These systems bridge critical data gaps to deliver precise, actionable building insights for better decision\-making.
   

  

 Founded by Stanford PhDs, we are committed to leveraging cutting\-edge AI to protect communities and businesses from disaster impacts. At ResiQuant, we're building a future where every organization has access to world\-class property risk intelligence to drive resilience and safeguard what matters most.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 We're seeking a visionary
 **Founding Generative AI Engineer** 
 who is passionate about our mission and ready to architect the future of AI\-driven disaster resilience. As a founding team member, you'll be responsible for designing and building comprehensive AI systems that seamlessly integrate human expertise with cutting\-
   

  

 edge machine intelligence.
   

  

 This role demands someone with a scrappy, hands\-on approach who can evolve alongside our team through all stages of growth. You'll be instrumental in establishing our technical culture, architectural decisions, and AI strategy while building scalable systems that solve real\-world problems at the intersection of structural engineering and artificial intelligence.
   

  

**Start date: Immediate**
**Responsibilities:**
* Technical Leadership: Drive the development and deployment of cutting\-edge computer vision and vision\-language models, ensuring alignment with company goals and industry best practices.
* Team Management: Lead a team of engineers, fostering a collaborative and innovative culture, setting clear goals, and ensuring high\-quality deliverables.
* R\&D and Innovation: Stay updated with the latest research in vision and vision\-language models,
* identifying and integrating new techniques and technologies to maintain a competitive edge.
* Model Optimization: Ensure models are efficient, scalable, and optimized for performance across various applications and platforms.
* Cross\-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with the founders, product managers, data scientists, and other members of the team to align model development with business objectives and product requirements.


 Qualifications:
   

  

* Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, AI, or a related field with a specialization in computer
* vision, NLP, or machine learning.
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in computer vision and vision\-language models.
* Deep expertise in LLM applications, human\-AI collaboration, and MLOps at scale
* Experience leading a team of engineers, with a track record of delivering successful AI projects
* that involve fine\-tunning, training, and deploying LLMs.
* Expertise designing and implementing machine learning architectures using frameworks like
* TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar.


 Technical Skills we're looking for:
   

  

* Strong knowledge of computer vision algorithms, vision\-language integration, and multimodal AI models.
* Proficiency in Python and experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) for model deployment.
* Familiarity with image processing libraries, NLP libraries, and LLMs (both, open source and commercial).


**What drives us:**
* Impact: we are driven by a shared mission to address a paramount challenge of our time
* Resolve: we believe that hard work and resilience yield extraordinary outcomes
* Urgency: we are motivated to outpace rapid urbanization and escalating disaster impacts


**Why Join ResiQuant:**
* Founding Impact: Opportunity to be a founding team member and architect the technical foundation of a company disrupting the $200B property insurance industry
* Technical Innovation: Build cutting\-edge AI systems at the intersection of structural engineering, climate science, and financial risk
* Real\-World Impact: Experience firsthand how your AI systems protect communities and businesses from disaster impacts
* Culture Building: Help establish the technical culture and engineering practices for a world\-class AI company


**Day to day:**
* AI System Architecture: Design and implement comprehensive LLM/VLM applications with human\-in\-the\-loop workflows
* Advanced MLOps: Build, deploy, and continuously optimize sophisticated AI systems with automated feedback loops
* Agent Orchestration: Develop and maintain complex multi\-agent systems for property risk assessment
* Technical Leadership: Guide architectural decisions, mentor team members, and drive technical innovation
* Cross\-functional Collaboration: Work closely with domain experts, product teams, and stakeholders to ensure AI solutions meet real\-world needs
* Research \& Development: Prototype novel approaches and integrate cutting\-edge AI research into production systems


**What we offer:**
* Competitive Compensation: Salary commensurate with experience and founding team equity
* Founding Team Equity: Significant equity stake as a founding member with substantial upside potential
* Premium Benefits: Comprehensive health insurance, 401(k) with company matching
* Innovation Environment: Vibrant tech startup culture with access to cutting\-edge technology and research
* Mission\-Driven Work: Opportunity to work on technology that makes a meaningful difference in disaster resilience


 The base salary range for this position is
 **$200,000–$220,000 per year** 
 , depending on experience and qualifications. Additionally, this role includes an equity component as part of the total compensation package, reflecting the early\-stage nature of our company.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 Foothill Ventures is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law.

title: Generative AI Engineer
description:
Founded in 2009, Zest AI has been pioneering innovative AI technology with a mission to expand credit access to create opportunities for more Americans to pursue their financial goals. Zest AI is transforming the
 
 $17 trillion US consumer credit market
 
 by delivering AI technology that helps lenders identify creditworthy borrowers overlooked by traditional methods, while leveling the playing field so financial institutions of all sizes can harness AI to provide better lending experiences.
 



  





 With over 50 issued and pending patents across automation, accuracy, performance, and model explainability, Zest AI is a leader in financial technology, providing financial institutions with AI tools that create a more resilient US financial system and a stronger U.S. economy. With over 600 active AI models, financial institutions rely on Zest AI's comprehensive suite of solutions spanning marketing, underwriting, fraud detection, lending intelligence, and more to make smarter lending decisions while improving profitability. This US\-based technology as a service company is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re seeking an AI Engineer (Gen AI) that shares the same passion in building enterprise\-level SaaS products that integrate with cutting edge AI technologies.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Become a key contributor to LuLu \- Zest AI’s GenAI SaaS product built for lending.
* Work within our GenAI team and build industry leading AI applications. Develop advanced GenAI features including data analytics and intelligent search.
* Lead Generative AI research initiatives to help us get on top of latest breakthroughs. Design and execute scientific experiments and evaluate results to help improve performance.
* Write and deploy production code in Python that supports client facing applications.
* Work closely with a cross\-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts, Software Engineers, Product managers to deliver high\-quality products..



  





**Qualifications** 



* A minimum of a Master’s degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, etc.) preferred
* Strong experience with modular/modern OOP software design using Python.
* Strong analytical skills and proficiency with using Pandas, Numpy, etc.
* Familiarity with source version control software, e.g., Git.
* Strong statistical and analytical knowledge to tackle complex and often under constrained data\-driven problems
* Knowledge and experience with GenAI applications (agentic framework, RAG, prompt engineering, etc.) is a strong plus but not required
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Established computer science fundamentals in data structures and algorithms
* Passionate about GenAI and how it can improve the world



  





**Perks and benefits:** 



* The opportunity to join a mission\-focused company
* People – the best part of Zest
* Robust medical, dental and vision insurance plans
* Annual bonus plan participation
* 401(k) with generous match
* Employee Awards and Recognition
* 11 company holidays
* Winter break (office closed between Christmas and New Year's Day)
* Unlimited vacation time
* Employee Resource Groups
* Generous family leave policy (12 week maternity leave / 6 week paternity leave)
* Phone, internet, wellness, and professional development allowances
* Employee gatherings, including Town Hall meetings



*Additionally, Zestys based locally and around our Burbank HQ enjoy:* 



* Beautiful, modern, dog\-friendly office with lounge areas, video games, and gigantic jigsaw puzzles
* Daily catered lunches from LA’s best restaurants and a fully stocked kitchen

description:

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in algorithm development, coding, data modeling, and data architecture, with a passion for applying innovative data science techniques to solve complex defense\-related problems. As a Data Scientist Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing data\-driven solutions, analyzing large datasets, and collaborating with cross\-functional teams to drive decision\-making and optimize processes.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Apply AI/ML modeling techniques in solving many types of problems
* Develop and design algorithmic solutions for automation projects
* Design, develop, and implement data science solutions to address defense\-related challenges
* Utilize advanced coding skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize large and complex datasets
* Develop and deploy machine learning models and algorithms to extract insights and make predictions
* Experience with LLM toolkits: IE LangChain, LlamaIndex, AutoGen, CrewAI, Semantic Kernel, Model Context Protocol, Agent2Agent, and Pydantic AI
* Strong understanding of RAG pipelines, prompt engineering, and token optimization
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to identify data requirements, gather relevant data, and define project objectives
* Design and optimize data architecture and infrastructure to support efficient data storage, processing, and analysis
* Stay up\-to\-date with the latest trends and advancements in data science, machine learning, and defense technology
* Communicate findings and recommendations to technical and non\-technical stakeholders through clear and compelling presentations and reports


**Requirements**
**Qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree or higher in Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field (Masters Degree preferred)
* Minimum of 3 years of experience
* Experience with many types of AI/ML modeling methods and algorithms for solving practical problems
* Expertise with DoD related domains, such as cybersecurity, intelligence analysis, or military operations
* Proven experience in coding (Python, R, Java, etc.) and software development, with a focus on data manipulation and analysis
* Strong background in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization techniques
* Experience with data architecture, database design, and data warehousing concepts
* Excellent problem\-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast\-paced and dynamic environment
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross\-functional teams
* Self\-starter with the ability to work autonomously with just the right amount of guidance
* Must be a US citizen
* Must pass a background check and drug screening


**About Sherpa 6**
 At Sherpa 6 we love to solve problems and provide the best solutions for our customers. Our approach to a problem is to find a user\-focused and design\-driven solution that is simple yet functional and effective. We are a group of enthusiastic forward\-thinkers who are excited to build amazing solutions with bleeding\-edge technology. We hire people who are forward thinkers, passionate about what they do, love to collaborate and want to constantly learn. We enjoy what we do and we're not afraid to put the extra effort in to accomplish the mission; call us Sherpas. As a Service\-Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business, we know what it means to serve. We have made it our mission to be the leaders in solutions that protect and give our Warfighters the edge they need when put into harm's way.

**Salary Range**
 The proposed salary range is reflective across all Sherpa 6 locations, years of experience and skill levels. Salary negotiations will be based on a host of factors including but not limited to your geographic location, prior experience, relevant skills, education, and certifications.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a competitive benefits package, covering the cost of medical for you and your family; we also offer dental, vision, health and wellness benefits and a generous retirement savings plan. We believe that our employees can manage their workload and their personal life, therefore we extend a generous PTO policy. This allows our employees to balance their lives as they see fit.
   

  

 Salary Description
   

  

 $92,000 \- $152,000

title: AI Engineer
description:
**Job Title** 
 : AI Engineer – Cellular Therapy \& Biomedical Informatics, Apeiron Research Center
 



**Location** 
 : In\-Person – Boulder, Colorado.
 



**Type** 
 : Full\-Time
 



**Compensation** 
 : Competitive, commensurate with experience and qualifications
 



  





**About the Apeiron Research Center** 




 We are a mission\-driven nonprofit advancing innovation in cellular therapies and regenerative medicine. Located in the innovation driven community of Boulder Colorado, our multidisciplinary research supports cutting\-edge biologic therapies, focusing on stem cell applications and personalized immunotherapies. We are building a state\-of\-the\-art AI\-driven informatics infrastructure to accelerate discovery and translational outcomes and optimize data integrity, analysis, and clinical insight generation.
 



  





**Position Overview** 




 We seek an experienced AI Engineer with a strong foundation in machine learning and full\-stack system design to join our translational research team. Demonstrated ability to navigate the complexities of biomedical data heterogeneity and a strong commitment to ethical data handling and privacy is paramount to success in this role. Expertise in laboratory science and/or cell therapy is highly desired. This role is central to the design, deployment, and scaling of secure and intelligent platforms for managing and analyzing large, multimodal datasets.
 



  





 Our laboratory and clinical sources include:
 


* Flow cytometry (FCS format)
* PCR and qPCR instruments
* Genomic and epigenetic sequencing
* High\-dimensional imaging modalities (e.g., 3D microscopy)
* Cellular therapy product records and metadata



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**Applied AI \& Tooling** 



* Design and deploy machine learning models to extract insights from structured and unstructured scientific data.
* Create intuitive tools, APIs, and dashboards for researchers and technical staff to interact with data and models.
* Collaborate with domain experts to translate their needs into efficient, ML\-ready data workflows.
* Apply machine learning to improve operational processes, quality control, and research decision\-making.



**Visualization \& User Experience** 



* Build interactive visualizations and interfaces that help surface model outputs and key insights to non\-technical users.
* Develop user\-centric applications that connect raw and processed data to intuitive visual stories.



**Data Systems \& Governance** 



* Build and maintain scalable, secure pipelines for data ingestion, transformation, and model training.
* Design and manage AI training datasets and model repositories with appropriate metadata and lineage
* Develop systems that support reproducibility, auditability, and versioning of datasets and model artifacts.
* Oversee data quality, access control, and compliance standards for internal and external sharing.
* Ensure systems support seamless collaboration between data scientists, engineers, and research staff.



  





**Desired Qualifications** 




**Education \& Experience:** 



* PhD or MS in AI, Bioinformatics, Computer Science, Biomedical Engineering, or related field.
* Bachelor’s degree considered with appropriate job\-specific experience.
* 3\+ years of post\-graduation experience in applied AI/ML, preferably in a lab or clinical research setting.



  





**Technical Skills:** 



* Snowflake, S3, HDF5
* Expertise in Python (PyTorch, scikit\-learn, TensorFlow, Biopython), R, and SQL
* Cloud platform familiarity (e.g., AWS, GCP, Docker, CI/CD pipelines)
* Understanding of modern security architectures
* High knowledge of HIPAA\-compliant data workflows
* Experience with the REDCap environment is a plus



  





**Interdisciplinary Aptitude** 



* Ability to work closely with laboratory and clinical researchers to translate needs into scalable AI systems.
* Strong understanding of biomedical data heterogeneity and ethical data handling.
* Comfort managing uncertainty and rapidly iterating on novel research hypotheses.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Mission\-Driven Impact: Build tools that directly accelerate real\-world biomedical breakthroughs.
* First\-Principles Innovation: Shape next\-generation AI infrastructure from the ground up.
* Multimodal Science: Work with imaging, genomics, flow cytometry, and clinical data in a single research stack.



  





**Application Process:** 




 Interested candidates should submit a detailed curriculum vitae, a cover letter describing research interests and relevant experience, and contact information for three professional references.
 



  





**Equal Opportunity Employer:** 




 Apeiron Research Center is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity, inclusion, and equality in the workplace.

title: Senior AI Engineer
description:
**Application window is expected to close by 06/15/2025\.**
**Job posting may be removed earlier if the position is filled or if a sufficient number of applications are received.**
**Meet the Team**
 The AI Software \& Platform Team delivers AI products so businesses around the world defend against threats and safeguard the most important aspects of business with security resilience. We are passionate about making businesses secure and simplifying security with zero compromise.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 As an AI Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in advancing AI security solutions at Cisco. This role offers the exciting opportunity to collaborate with a team of experts and contribute to groundbreaking projects that shape the future of AI security. As a team, we push the frontiers of AI security through a diverse set of workstreams:
   

  

* Lead projects with software engineers, data scientists or MLE to build novel algorithms, architect complex systems and build industry leading solutions.
* Work with the privacy team at Cisco and product to build data compliance, provenance and governance policies.
* Lead cross\-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into Cisco's security products.
* Influence Leadership and Product on building the next generation solutions, establishing long\-term strategic vision and forging new technological pathways.
* You'll have the opportunity to contribute to our overall machine learning and software development culture as a leader in the org.


**Minimum Qualifications**
* Bachelor with 5 year / Master degree with 2 year / PhD in Computer Science, with experience in AI model development OR Software development
* Proficiency in at least one modern programming language (e.g. Go, Python, etc.)
* Experience with Kubernetes or other container orchestration for deploying and managing microservices at scale.
* Understanding of machine learning model inference APIs and their integration into backend systems.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* An attitude of hands\-on learning and constant experimentation to decompose and understand problem areas, with excellent written and verbal communication skills, strong analytical and problem\-solving skills.
* Comfortable with fast iterative style development in an environment that requires autonomous thinking, risk taking and bias for action.
* Understanding the latest GenAI technologies and creative prompting. Comfortable with traditional ML frameworks like pytorch and TensorFlow, or containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
* Hands on experience with model developing, data processing, or model hosting platforms and services, such as AWS SageMaker, Kubeflow, Hugging Face, KServe.
* Ability to lead a project with multiple engineers, handle scoping, design, excution and maintenance.


**Why Cisco**
* 


 At Cisco, we’re revolutionizing how data and infrastructure connect and protect organizations in the AI era – and beyond. We’ve been innovating fearlessly for 40 years to create solutions that power how humans and technology work together across the physical and digital worlds. These solutions provide customers with unparalleled security, visibility, and insights across the entire digital footprint. Simply put – we power the future.
   

  

 Fueled by the depth and breadth of our technology, we experiment and create meaningful solutions. Add to that our worldwide network of doers and experts, and you’ll see that the opportunities to grow and build are limitless. We work as a team, collaborating with
   

  

 empathy to make really big things happen on a global scale. Because our solutions are everywhere, our impact is everywhere.
   

  

 We are Cisco, and our power starts with you.

 Senior AI Engineer

 IT

 VP Software Development

 Remote
   

  

**Who We Are\-**
 Elevate Aviation Group, established in 2003, provides air transportation, travel consultancy, aircraft acquisitions and aircraft management services to some of the most recognized names in business, sports, entertainment, government, and higher education. Elevate Aviation Group’s wholly owned subsidiaries, Private Jet Services, Elevate Jet, and Elevate MRO share a mission to provide aircraft owners and flyers unsurpassed service, safety, and counsel. Whether clients require charter flights, large group travel, aircraft management services, aircraft maintenance or aircraft acquisition services, Elevate Aviation Group delivers highly personalized solutions to meet each client’s unique needs 24 hours a day, 365 days of the year to any destination.
   

  

**Summary Of Position\-**
 We are seeking a highly skilled Senior AI Engineer to develop and implement AI and machine learning solutions using a combination of external and proprietary data sources. This role will leverage AWS tools and services to build scalable, secure, and efficient data\-driven systems that support business decision\-making, optimize operations, and foster innovation across the organization.
   

  

**Essential Duties \& Responsibilities\-**
* Design, develop, test, deploy, and support AI software components including foundation model training, large language model inference, similarity search, guardrails, model evaluation, experimentation, governance, and observability
* Invent and introduce state\-of\-the\-art LLM optimization techniques to improve the performance \- scalability, cost, latency, throughput \- of our aviation systems.
* Contribute to the technical vision and the long term roadmap of foundational AI systems
* Foster productive cross\-functional communication with our teams, actively proposing AI\-driven enhancements for novel product features
* Engage in in\-depth technical exploration of diverse machine learning solutions, technology stacks, and infrastructure to drive innovation and optimisation
* Develop monitoring, alerting, and diagnostics systems to ensure high\-quality product delivery.
* Ensure data privacy, security, and compliance by following industry best practices for access control and encryption.
* Effectively communicate insights and model outcomes to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders using visualization tools.


**Knowledge, Skills \& Abilities\-**
**Required:**
* Strong expertise in Python, R, or other data science programming languages, with hands\-on AWS integration experience.
* Experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit\-learn on AWS.
* Proficiency in AWS data storage and compute services (e.g., S3, RDS, EMR).
* Deep understanding of AWS security, compliance, and data privacy best practices.


**Preferred:**
* Experience deploying models using AWS SageMaker Pipelines or MLOps on AWS.
* Knowledge of AWS AI services (e.g., Comprehend, Rekognition, Translate).
* Familiarity with big data technologies on AWS (e.g., Elastic MapReduce, Glue, Athena).


**Education \& Experience\-**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field (PhD is a plus).
* 5\+ years of experience in data science, AI, or machine learning, with practical AWS infrastructure experience.


**Schedule \& Travel\-**
* Normal business hours are expected.
* Travel not anticipated.


**Miscellaneous\-**
* FLSA Status\- Full Time exempt
* Lifting requirements\- Up to 20lbs.

title: CSM AI Engineer
description:
**Introduction**
 As a Customer Success Specialist (CSM) focused on watsonx AI at IBM, you will play a pivotal role in enabling clients to successfully adopt, deploy, and realize value from IBM’s leading AI and foundation model platform. This role is ideal for early professionals with at least 2\+ years of experience who are passionate about AI, have technical aptitude, and thrive in client\-facing environments.
   

  

 IBM's watsonx platform empowers enterprises to scale and govern trusted AI across workloads. Your work will help clients unlock productivity, accelerate innovation, and responsibly integrate AI into their business.
   

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 As a CSM for watsonx AI, your mission is to ensure clients successfully implement and scale AI solutions, with a strong focus on foundation models, generative AI, and data\-driven applications. You will:
   

  

* Serve as a trusted technical advisor to help clients plan, adopt, and optimize their use of watsonx.ai, watsonx.data, and watsonx.governance.
* Lead AI use case discovery workshops and co\-create solutions that align with strategic business goals.
* Guide clients through the model lifecycle—from data ingestion, training, and fine\-tuning, to deployment and responsible AI governance.
* Collaborate with product, engineering, and sales teams to ensure alignment and drive renewals and expansion.
* Build customer success plans that increase AI adoption, engagement, and measurable ROI.


**Preferred Education**
 Bachelor's Degree
   

  

**Required Technical And Professional Expertise**
* Client Engagement \& Discovery: Understand each client's data and AI maturity, challenges, and goals to position watsonx solutions effectively.
* Technical Enablement: Provide hands\-on support and guidance for using watsonx.ai (LLM\-based development), watsonx.data (governed data lakehouse), and watsonx.governance (AI governance and risk tools).
* Use Case Framing \& MVP Builds: Identify and build AI use cases, prototypes, or proof of value to demonstrate watsonx’s potential.
* Success Measurement: Define KPIs, adoption metrics, and success frameworks to track and report client outcomes.
* Customer Advocacy: Act as the voice of the customer to internal IBM teams to improve product and support experiences.


**Preferred Technical And Professional Experience**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or a related technical field.
* 2\+ years of experience in customer\-facing roles (Customer Success, Pre\-Sales, Solution Consulting, etc.).
* Foundational knowledge of AI/ML concepts, data pipelines, and cloud\-native technologies.
* Ability to read or write code in Python or other modern programming languages.
* Excellent interpersonal, communication, and problem\-solving skills.
* Comfort with presenting to both technical and non\-technical audiences.
* Experience with foundation models, generative AI, or similar platforms (e.g., Hugging Face, OpenAI, Vertex AI).
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (IBM Cloud, AWS, Azure, or GCP).
* Understanding of MLOps, data governance, or AI risk management practices.
* Previous work with IBM watsonx or similar enterprise AI platforms is a strong plus.

title: Senior AI Engineer (f/m/d) - Berlin
description:
#### **Why Choose UXCam**

  

Join UXCam, a leading analytics company simplifying product analytics for web and mobile applications through the power of AI. We empower product teams globally by providing intuitive insights that drive impactful product decisions. At UXCam, you'll collaborate with a diverse and dynamic team dedicated to revolutionizing user‑experience analytics and making data‑driven decision‑making effortlessly accessible.


Ready for your next career challenge? Join us in revolutionizing mobile and web app interactions.  

  

**Our tech stack:**

* Back‑end \& Data: Trino, ORC/Parquet, AWS (S3, EMR, ECS/EKS, Lambda), Redis, PostgreSQL
* Languages \& Frameworks: Python (Django, FastAPI), TypeScript/JavaScript, ReactJS

#### **About The Role**


As a Senior AI Engineer, you will spearhead the research and development of intelligent, agent‑driven analytics capabilities that unlock the full value of UXCam’s rich interaction data. Partnering closely with Product Leadership and cross‑functional teams, you will translate our AI vision into scalable, production‑ready solutions—laying the technical foundation for the next generation of product‑analytics experiences.

#### **What You’ll Be Doing**

* Invent state‑of‑the‑art methods for agent‑powered, self‑service product analytics—applying generative AI, and state\-of\-the\-art statistics and ML techniques.
* Design and implement Model Context Protocol (MCP)–compliant tools and interfaces that AI agents can invoke to generate meaningful, context‑aware insights for our customers.
* Architect and scale data‑analytics infrastructure on AWS, employing Trino, ORC, Redis, and PostgreSQL to process billions of behavioural events efficiently and cost‑effectively.
* Collaborate deeply with Product, Design, and Engineering to shape UXCam’s AI roadmap—from discovery and rapid prototyping to production deployment and continuous improvement.
* Champion data quality, governance, and privacy, ensuring that analytic outputs are robust, trustworthy, and compliant with GDPR and SOC 2\.
* Enable and mentor fellow engineers and data scientists, fostering a culture of experimentation, rigorous peer review, and engineering excellence.

#### **What You’ll Need to Succeed at this role**

* 5\+ years of hands‑on experience building data‑intensive or AI‑driven products at scale, with at least 3 years focused on machine‑learning engineering or applied research.
* Expert‑level Python (Django/FastAPI) and strong proficiency in distributed‑query engines (Trino/Presto) and columnar formats (ORC/Parquet).
* Proven track record designing real‑time or batch data pipelines on AWS (e.g., S3, EMR, Glue, Lambda, ECS/EKS).
* Deep understanding of modern LLM and agent frameworks (e.g., LangChain, OpenAI, Hugging Face Transformers) and how to operationalise them in production.
* Excellent communication and product‑thinking skills—you can distil complex technical concepts into clear business value.  

  

Preferred Qualifications
* Advanced degree (MSc/PhD) in Mathematics, Computer Science, Physics, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related field.
* Experience implementing causal‑impact analysis, anomaly‑detection, or session‑replay analytics at scale.
* Familiarity with vector databases, semantic‑search, and Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures.
* Prior exposure to B2B SaaS or developer‑tooling products.

#### **What we'll offer you**

* Competitive salary in a flat, dynamic organisational structure.
* Autonomy, impactful challenges, and clear growth pathways.
* Global collaboration with passionate colleagues from diverse backgrounds.
* Flexible and supportive working environment (hybrid model, Berlin HQ).
* Office amenities including breakfast, lunch, and snacks.

#### **About us**

  

At **UXCam**, we provide product analytics without the complexity. Our mission is to empower companies with the visibility to surface user frustrations and make every second spent on their app or web products meaningful. Trusted by global brands, we provide actionable insights through session replay, heatmaps, and advanced analytics to deliver exceptional app experiences. As a growing and dynamic company, we value collaboration, innovation, and customer\-centricity.  

  

Are you ready to do the best work of your career? At UXCam, you'll work alongside self\-driven, creative, and entrepreneurial\-minded individuals. We're looking for people who feel empowered by flat hierarchies and want to make an impact at our hyper\-growth stage startup.
We're proud to work with global brands like Delivery Hero, Rappi, Costa Coffee, and Virgin Mobile to deliver the best mobile app experiences. By leading with the unshakable belief that caring for customers leads to better businesses, we're backed by Silicon Valley investors and 500 Startups.  

At UXCam, diversity is our strength. We're committed to creating an inclusive environment and looking for team members from diverse professional and cultural backgrounds. If you're ready for your next big career challenge, we want to hear from you.

title: Senior AI Engineer (f/m/d) - Berlin
description:
**Why Choose UXCam**





  

 Join UXCam, a leading analytics company simplifying product analytics for web and mobile applications through the power of AI. We empower product teams globally by providing intuitive insights that drive impactful product decisions. At UXCam, you'll collaborate with a diverse and dynamic team dedicated to revolutionizing user‑experience analytics and making data‑driven decision‑making effortlessly accessible.
 



 Ready for your next career challenge? Join us in revolutionizing mobile and web app interactions.
   

  

**Our tech stack:** 



* Back‑end \& Data: Trino, ORC/Parquet, AWS (S3, EMR, ECS/EKS, Lambda), Redis, PostgreSQL
* Languages \& Frameworks: Python (Django, FastAPI), TypeScript/JavaScript, ReactJS



  

  




**About The Role**





 As a Senior AI Engineer, you will spearhead the research and development of intelligent, agent‑driven analytics capabilities that unlock the full value of UXCam’s rich interaction data. Partnering closely with Product Leadership and cross‑functional teams, you will translate our AI vision into scalable, production‑ready solutions—laying the technical foundation for the next generation of product‑analytics experiences.
 



  

  




**What You’ll Be Doing**




* Invent state‑of‑the‑art methods for agent‑powered, self‑service product analytics—applying generative AI, and state\-of\-the\-art statistics and ML techniques.
* Design and implement Model Context Protocol (MCP)–compliant tools and interfaces that AI agents can invoke to generate meaningful, context‑aware insights for our customers.
* Architect and scale data‑analytics infrastructure on AWS, employing Trino, ORC, Redis, and PostgreSQL to process billions of behavioural events efficiently and cost‑effectively.
* Collaborate deeply with Product, Design, and Engineering to shape UXCam’s AI roadmap—from discovery and rapid prototyping to production deployment and continuous improvement.
* Champion data quality, governance, and privacy, ensuring that analytic outputs are robust, trustworthy, and compliant with GDPR and SOC 2\.
* Enable and mentor fellow engineers and data scientists, fostering a culture of experimentation, rigorous peer review, and engineering excellence.



  

  




**What You’ll Need to Succeed at this role**




* 5\+ years of hands‑on experience building data‑intensive or AI‑driven products at scale, with at least 3 years focused on machine‑learning engineering or applied research.
* Expert‑level Python (Django/FastAPI) and strong proficiency in distributed‑query engines (Trino/Presto) and columnar formats (ORC/Parquet).

title: Data & AI Engineer (f/m/d)
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------

  

At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life\-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R\&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your Role**


* Design and develop scalable data architectures and pipelines, including graph databases, to support AI and analytics initiatives.
* Implement and operationalize machine learning and Generative AI solutions, including RAG systems, ensuring alignment with business goals.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to translate business requirements into robust technical solutions.
* Ensure data quality, governance, and performance optimization, while keeping systems aligned with current trends and technologies.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation for data processes, AI models, and system architectures.


**Your Profile**


* Academic background in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or related fields; domain expertise in Automotive, Life Sciences, Manufacturing, or Public Sector is a plus.
* Proficiency in Python, SQL/NoSQL databases, big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop), and graph databases (e.g., Neo4j, AWS Neptune).
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and cloud data warehousing (e.g., Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery).
* Familiarity with data science and Generative AI frameworks (e.g., scikit\-learn, TensorFlow, LangChain) and MLOps practices including CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.
* Strong communication skills in German and English, with a collaborative and self\-driven mindset.


**What you’ll love about working here?**


* An environment in which you can constantly develop yourself. Our range of training programs are designed to help you discover a world of opportunities \- be it through specialist training, mentoring or innovative projects.
* Work\-life balance: Work flexibly \- depending on the project assignment and agreement within the team, you have the opportunity to work flexibly in terms of location and flexitime at various locations.
* Diversity ensures inspiration and innovation in our company \- work in a diverse and open team that relies on mutual support and exchange.


**Not a 100% match? No need to worry! Capgemini Engineering supports you with a wide range of learning opportunities so that you can develop both professionally and personally.**



**WE LOOK FORWARD TO MEETING YOU**



Do you have any questions about the job profile and/or requirements?  

Please get in touch with your contact person in Recruiting.  

**Michel Haverkamp, Recruiter** **Capgemini Engineering Deutschland S.A.S. \& Co. KG**  

  

michel.haverkamp@capgemini.com  

Please fill in our **online application form** completely and attach your CV, work and school certificates as well as any other relevant documents.  

We wish you every success for your application.

**Company Description**
-----------------------

  

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55\-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end\-to\-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22\.1 billion.

**Benefits**
------------

  

* Individueller Karriereplan
* Vielfältiges Weiterbildungsangebot
* Industrieübergreifender Wissenstransfer
* E\-Gym WellPass
* Nachhaltig unterwegs \- Das JobRad\-Programm
* Einkaufsvorteile und Rabattaktionen
* Zahlreiche Events
* Attraktives Mitarbeiterbeteiligungsprogramm
* Betriebliche Altersvorsorge
* Mobiles Arbeiten nach Absprache (In\- und Ausland)
* Individuelle Arbeits\- und Teilzeitmodelle
* Wertorientierte Unternehmenskultur
* Individual career plan
* Diverse range of further trainings
* Cross\-industry knowledge transfer
* E\-Gym WellPass
* Sustainable on the road \- the JobRad program
* Shopping advantages and discount promotions
* Numerous events
* Attractive employee stock ownership program
* Company pension plan
* Mobile work by arrangements (domestic and abroad)
* Individual work and part\-time models
* Value oriented corporate culture

title: AI Engineer (m/f/d)
description:
Resaro was founded on the belief that AI will change the world in ways we cannot even imagine, but every new technology needs safeguards to advance.
 



  





 We’re looking for an
 



**AI Engineer** 
 to help shape how our AI platform supports new model development, deployment, and monitoring on the client side. You'll be responsible for implementing, optimizing, and deploying AI models and systems in real\-world environments. Your work ensures that custom AI builds are reliable, scalable, and well\-integrated with existing IT infrastructure.
 



  





 What You’ll Do:
 


* Testing compatibility of AI models to be integrated into AI platform and production systems.
* Optimizing algorithms for performance, scalability, and cost efficiency (e.g., reducing latency, model compression).
* Setting up APIs and interfaces to expose AI functionality to client systems.
* Collaborate with Solution Architect and Forward Deployed Engineer and define new features that improve model lifecycle support.
* Contribute reusable artifacts (sample notebooks, templates, benchmarks) for internal and external users.



  





 What We’re Looking For:
 


* 3\+ years experience in data science or AI engineering roles.
* Solid understanding of ML fundamentals, including model training, validation, and inference in either Computer Vision or Natural Language Processing.
* Hands\-on experience with Python, Jupyter, and ML libraries within the specific domain area (e.g. OpenCV, PyTorch, Huggingface Transformers, Diffusers).
* Familiarity with MLOps tools (e.g., MLflow, Airflow, Kubeflow, SageMaker).
* Bonus: Experience supporting ML platforms, building internal tooling, or working cross\-functionally with engineers and product teams.



  





 Why This Role?
 



 You’ll help make sure our platform isn’t just powerful — it’s AI\-native, usable by practitioners, and capable of handling the next generation of AI testing at scale.
 



  





 ABOUT US
 



 Resaro is a global AI Assurance company, pioneering the field of AI testing and evaluation. We are a team of AI experts, engineers, and data scientists. Our mission is to ensure an AI market worthy of trust.
 



  





 Resaro is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our teams.
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and IT System Testing and Evaluation

title: Senior AI Engineer with focus on LLMs (m/f/d)
description:
**Motius \- We R\&D** 
 : Motius is an R\&D company specialized in solving challenges with emerging tech to create longlasting value for customers. With the unique combination of a permanent core team and an interdisciplinary tech community, we reinvent R\&D and develop the tech products of the future.
 



 As Senior Deep Learning Engineer (m/f/d) you are part of our R\&D projects, in which you have your focus on exciting LLM topics. Find sample projects in our
 
 Motius Success Stories
 
 .
 



  





**Your Role** 



* Senior AI Engineer with focus on LLMs (m/f/d) in our R\&D projects with engineering teams of 2\-5 people
* Researching and building real AI and LLM solutions for a wide range of industries and for different use cases \- from a first PoC and MVP to fully operating applications
* Defining the right tech stack and setting up the architecture for the projects by following a two\-weekly Scrum process using GitLab, Jira, Slack, Continuous Integration \& Delivery, etc.
* Mentoring and coaching engineers on LLM topics and Multi\-Agent Systems, making sure we build high quality products
* Constantly improving our Enterprise AI Business Unit and building up knowledge by introducing new tools, best practices or frameworks and sharing learnings from our projects



  





**Your Profile** 



* University degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering with focus on AI or in similar disciplines and at least 3\-5 years of track record in agile software development
* Deep know how in Large Language Models and experience in designing and implementing LLM\-based solutions ranging from RAG to Multi\-Agent systems, ideally also experience with Multimodal Large Language Models
* Strong experience in Python, with various libraries/frameworks, LLM cloud providers, prompt engineering and tracing / evaluation tools combined with knowledge of state\-of\-the\-art Machine \& Deep Learning approaches in NLP and CV
* Experience in engineering and architectural practices such as code refactoring, design patterns, design driven development, continuous integration, building highly scalable applications/digital products
* Strong research, analytical and problem solving skills paired with the ability to develop creative and efficient solutions for our clients
* Comfortable with ambiguity and rapid changes common in early\-stage product development, interest in learning new tech stacks and strong command of English language (both verbal and written), German is a plus



  





**Your Benefits** 



* **We enable:** 
 The chance to use newest technologies in our different R\&D projects, an individual learning \& development budget and a defined
 
 Talent Journey
 
 for your further growth
* **We create** 
 : Huge impact on future products and insights from a broad range of industries, in an environment with flexible working hours and up to 50% remote work
* **We explore** 
 : Regular
 
 Tech Discovery
 
 and Discovery Conference to stay close to new tech
* **We are community\-driven** 
 : Vibrant and interdisciplinary tech community as well as regular team buildings and company events



  





**Motius is colorful** 
 \- We embrace and value equal opportunities, inclusion, and diversity. Therefore, we welcome every application with pleasure!
 



  





 Find more reasons why you should join Motius in our latest
 
 blog post
 
 and on Instagram
 
 @team\_motius
 
 . Does that make you curious?
 **Julia** 
 is happy to hear from you!

title: Cloud Conversational AI Engineer, Google Cloud Consulting (English, German)
description:
Minimum qualifications:
   

  

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
* 3 years of experience building machine learning solutions and working with technical customers.
* Experience coding in one or more general purpose languages (e.g., Python, Java, Go, C or C\+\+) including data structures, algorithms, and software design.
* Ability to communicate in English and German fluently as this is a customer\-facing role that requires interactions in German with local stakeholders.


 Preferred qualifications:
   

  

* Experience building conversational applications with Google Dialogflow or similar products/tools.
* Experience building applications powered by Large Language Models.
* Experience in technical consulting.
* Experience with modern cloud architectures and technologies.
* Understanding of contact center technologies and platforms (e.g., Avaya, Genesys, Cisco, Mitel, Twilio, etc.).
* Experience designing cloud enterprise solutions and supporting customer projects to completion.


**About The Job**
 The Google Cloud Consulting Professional Services team guides customers through the moments that matter most in their cloud journey to help businesses thrive. We help customers transform and evolve their business through the use of Google’s global network, web\-scale data centers, and software infrastructure. As part of an innovative team in this rapidly growing business, you will help shape the future of businesses of all sizes and use technology to connect with customers, employees, and partners.
   

  

 As a Cloud AI Engineer, you will design and implement machine learning solutions for customer use cases, leveraging core Google products including TensorFlow, DataFlow, and Vertex AI. You will work with customers to identify opportunities to apply machine learning in their business, and travel to customer sites to deploy solutions and deliver workshops to educate and empower customers. Additionally, you will work closely with Product Management and Product Engineering to build and constantly drive excellence in our products.
   

  

 In this role, you are the Google Engineer working with Google's largest and most aspiring Cloud customers.You will support customer implementation of Google Cloud products through architecture guidance, best practices, data migration, capacity planning, implementation, troubleshooting, monitoring, and much more.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise\-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting\-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Work with Customers, Partners, and Google Product teams to deliver Conversational AI solutions into production.
* Coach customers on the practical tests in Conversational AI design of conversational flows, integrations with third\-party systems like contact centers, websites, mobile applications, and popular messaging platforms.
* Be a trusted technical advisor to customers and solve real business issues with Conversational AI.
* Create and deliver best practices recommendations, tutorials, blog articles, sample code, and technical presentations adapting to different levels of key business and technical stakeholders.
* Travel up to 30% and also use video conferencing in\-person for meetings, technical reviews, and onsite delivery activities as needed.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form.
